Source code for sigvisa.models.wiggles.wiggle_models

import numpy as np
from sigvisa.models.noise.noise_model import get_noise_model



[docs]def wiggle_model_by_name(name, **kwargs):
    if name == "base":
        return WiggleModel(**kwargs)
    elif name == "stupidiid":
        return StupidL1WiggleModel(**kwargs)
    elif name == "plain":
        return PlainWiggleModel(**kwargs)




[docs]class WiggleModel(object):

    def __init__(self, tm):
        self.tm = tm


[docs]    def template_ncost(wave, phases, params):
        raise Exception("not implemented")



[docs]    def summary_str(self):
        return "base"




[docs]class StupidL1WiggleModel(WiggleModel):


[docs]    def template_ncost(self, wave, phases, params):
        generated = self.tm.generate_template_waveform((phases, params), model_waveform=wave)
        diff = (wave.data - generated.data)
        return np.sum(np.abs(diff))



[docs]    def summary_str(self):
        return "stupidiid"




[docs]class PlainWiggleModel(WiggleModel):

    """

    Model signal as AR noise + plain template (no wiggles)

    """


[docs]    def template_ncost(self, wave, phases, params):
        generated = self.tm.generate_template_waveform((phases, params), model_waveform=wave)
        nm = get_noise_model(wave)
        ll = nm.lklhood(data=(wave.data - generated.data), zero_mean=True)
        return ll



[docs]    def summary_str(self):
        return "plain"
